titleStmt.title: Information for Whytefield Hayter, and James Chiesly merchants in London, and partners. Against the skinners in Edinburgh.
titleStmt.author: Hayter, Whytefield, merchant, fl. 1695.
Chiesly, James, merchant, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Hayter and Chiesly had set up a company for dressing and colouring leather, to the objections of the skinners of Edinburgh.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
